nodes.text: This Consular-class cruiser was part of the Republic garrison that was sent to Scipio to defend Republic interests and Scipio's neutrality. It was accompanied by several LAAT/i gunships and dozens of Clone shock troopers.
This cruiser was deployed to Scipio just prior to the invasion of Scipio. It was later destroyed in the Separatist assault, by a trio of Hyena-class bombers.
